entry.title: Thursday: Periods of ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of ice pellets late this afternoon with risk of freezing rain. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 3 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of ice pellets changing to periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets late this evening. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
